title: Why is Berserker getting a major buff in the next patch?
body:
> 6 Champ now also gain 50 AD

This is going to clear entire boards in the first 1-2 seconds of combat.
That is 50 precrit AD on 6 champs coning damage

Not to mention Voli is a Berserker, ALSO getting a major buff in Electric, and Berserker already has OP Olaf....... 
And pairs with Predator......

replies.body: Compared to woodland and predators in the early game, they're really bad. The creators want to make all synergies viable, so berserkers need this. Olaf is the carry, but past him they're such trash.

> [{quoted}](name=Wake90,realm=NA,application-id=RaE1aOE7,discussion-id=5o7LosXo,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-11-29T08:39:16.836+0000)
>
> Compared to woodland and predators in the early game, they're really bad. The creators want to make all synergies viable, so berserkers need this. 

Early game you can't get 6 Berserker.
The buf is for mid-late game when you already have Olaf.
Practically Olaf will receive a new buff :))

> [{quoted}](name=Wake90,realm=NA,application-id=RaE1aOE7,discussion-id=5o7LosXo,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-11-29T08:39:16.836+0000)
>
> Olaf is the carry, but past him they're such trash.

Who wants to play Berserker without Olaf ? Remove "Berserker" from Olaf or nerf Olaf and then buff Berserkers.

They aren't trash. Berserkers by themselves literally beat anything but Ocean/Mage, and on the right itemization they beat even them.

Volibear specifically when he crits with his cone almost 1 shots an entire team, if Ornn and Zed are on the team (Or an electric Lux)

Sion is literally one of the strongest units in the game with his Q. Mundo with his Poison + self heal + aoe burn...... totally trash lmfao.
The fact that Olaf can singlehandedly win you the game, and one of his synergies is getting dramatically buffed, is frightening at best.
